Package com.alexisdrai.popsim

Class FemaleRabbit

java.lang.Object
com.alexisdrai.popsim.Rabbit
com.alexisdrai.popsim.FemaleRabbit
public final class FemaleRabbit
extends Rabbit

has all fields and methods of the Rabbit class, adding onto it features pertaining to birthing and fertility

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void ageUp()
    increments a FemaleRabbit's ageInMonths by one month, then calls checks for death and maturity, and finally plans out yearly litters
    (package private) boolean[] getPregnancyPlanner()  
    (package private) boolean isFertile()  
    (package private) boolean isPotentiallyFertile()  
    (package private) void maturificate()
    simply sets this FemaleRabbit's isMature property to true, if it turns out to be of age and not mature yet.
    (package private) void setFertile​(boolean fertile)  
    private void updatePregnancyPlanner()
    updates a FemaleRabbit's pregnancyPlanner; index origin is based on the rabbit's maturation anniversary
    private void wipePregnancyPlanner()
    empties all of a FemaleRabbit's pregnancyPlanner and sets its elements to false
